en.title: FFPE block may be depleted?
en.description: Matched reference blood required (see SPECIMEN- BLOOD)

en.title: Fresh frozen block may be depleted?
en.description: Matched reference blood required (see SPECIMEN- BLOOD)

en.title: De-identified, pathologist reviewed and marked H&E slide included (required for fresh frozen or FFPE sections or tissue blocks).
Confirmation that Data is Ready for Review
Do you accept the final report.

isPublic.description: Welcome to the OICR Genomics Requisition Form.  A user account and study authorization is required, contact dax.torti@oicr.on.ca.

description.en: This requisition form contains Personal Health Information (PHI); PHI is visible to clinical coordinators and clinical medical geneticists only.  Completed requisition forms and or clinical reports contain PHI; PHI is maintained within a secure database.  Do not distribute or include PHI fields in any communications or shipments to OICR. Ontario Institute for Cancer Research c/o Tissue Portal Sample Receiving MaRS Centre, West Tower 661 University Avenue, Suite 6-46 Toronto, Ontario, Canada, M5G 0A3 Director: Trevor Pugh, PhD, FACMG Phone: 647-468-7844 Main contact: Dax Torti, PhD Phone: 647-260-7938 Hours of Operation: Mon - Fri, 9:00AM - 5:00PM CAP: xxx IQMH: xxx

body.html:

[settings.formKey]-[numberid]: A requsition was recieved by OICR. Accessioner approval pending.

Dear [name_to],

An [settings.title.en] was recieved.

SUBMITTED ON: [submit_date]

[settings.title.en]

[settings.formKey]-[numberid]

[name_applicant]

[email_applicant]

Next steps:

  1. OICR accessioner, please login and approve/deny the requisition.
  2. If denied, enter reason for denial in dialog box.
  3. The requisitioner will be notified of denial and may re-open and edit the requisition. Requistion version and status may be reviewed in case history tab.
Login to Approve/Deny Requisition »

body.html:

OICR Genomics Requisition
[settings.title.en][settings.formKey]-[numberid] was denied.

Dear [name_to],

[settings.title.en][settings.formKey]-[numberid] was denied. Your requsition may have been denied due to incomplete/incorrect data entry or study approval. Do not submit sample(s).

SUBMITTED ON: [submit_date]

[settings.title.en]

[settings.formKey]-[numberid]

SUBMITTED BY:

[name_applicant]

[email_applicant]

Next steps:

  1. Requsitioner, reopen requsition.
  2. Edit requistion, correcting entry error.
  3. Submit revised requsition. Revision history may be reviewed in case history.
  4. Await approval and receipt of approval notification email.
Login to reopen and edit requisition »

  3. If case is not currently signed out, review must stop.
